snippet: The Winter X Games in France will not feature a snowmobile freestyle demonstration because organizers continue to review the event’s safety procedures after the death of Caleb Moore.
abstract: Winter X Games in Tignes, France, will not feature snowmobile freestyle demonstration as organizers continue to review event's safety after death of competitor Caleb Moore.
lead_paragraph: The Winter X Games in France will not feature a snowmobile freestyle demonstration because organizers continue to review the event’s safety procedures after the death of Caleb Moore.

headline.seo: Winter X Games in France Drop Snowmobile Freestyle
headline.main: X Games in France Drop Snowmobile
headline.print_headline: X Games in France Drop Snowmobile
